text: The Overcoat () is a 1926 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Grigori Kozintsev and Leonid Trauberg.Госфильмофонд представит оцифрованные советские фильмы на Петербургском культурном форумеШинель It stars Andrei Kostrichkin, Antonina Eremeeva, and Aleksei Kapler. ==Actors== * Andrei Kostrichkin as Akakiy Akakievich Baschmachkin * Antonina Eremeeva as girl, "heavenly creation" * Aleksei Kapler as "insignificant man" / "significant man" * Emil Gal as tailor * Sergei Gerasimov as Yaryzhka, swindler-blackmailer == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1926 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Leonid Trauberg Category:Movies directed by Grigori Kozintsev
title: The Overcoat (1926 movie)
